text.Contract title and description: Client Side Partner Services
text.KPI name and description:
The Provider must ensure
• All issues and risks, including buildings which are identified as out of tolerance, are assigned an identified risk and issue code and a corresponding action or mitigation plan within 10 working days unless the programme agrees otherwise.

• All live delivery issues and risks must have an appropriate agreed owner, action plan for resolution (unless agreed this is unnecessary), and proposed resolution date.
o The action plan will ensure that the risk’s identified risk level (set by a programme formula) does not grow in the following month: unless this is outside of the Provider or Programme’s control and the danger of the risk’s growth has been appropriately escalated.
Indicator: Number of instances of observed non-compliance with delivery issues and Risk management
text.Good target:
Zero instances of non-compliance or quality issues raised by the authority against the criteria outlined in the KPI.
All risks & issues are treated in line with its requirements 100% of the time.

Security Incidents - Number of Security Incidents / loss of assets 

 1. Notified of all incident or breaches with 24hrs of discovery.

2. Report to be provided of all incidents/breaches at monthly contract meetings unless action is required promptly. (eg. item sent to wrong locations, items lost, building/vehicle security malfunctions or issues)

3.If an item is not found within 14 working days, it will be classed as a security incident and is reported as such.

4. incident is classified as a break in the process, such as a file not found, a broken down vehicle etc that would leave our processes and data vulnerable to risk. A breach is classified as HRMC data of which the security has been compromised.
